name: Dad Standing
description:
The first Stand type game. Can you remain standing long enough to impress your friends with a cool joke?

Features:

  • beautiful pixel art illustrations
  • fully voiced by AI voice actor Joey
  • over 50 hand-picked jokes
  • 3 levels of increasing difficulty

Made during Global Game Jam 2023, Latvia.

Game design, programming, audio design by Jāzeps R.
Art by Katrīna L.
